subtitle: Your profile has been successfully completed and verified. You are now ready to use Safe Driving as a driver.
subsubtitle: Your personal QR code has been generated:
instructions: It will allow your passengers to quickly and safely identify you. You can view or download this QR code anytime from the My Account > My QR Code menu.
message: Thank you for being part of the Safe Driving community. We wish you safe and enjoyable rides!
